mn3:3.1_0: Idhāhaṁ, bhikkhave, bhuttāvī assaṁ pavārito paripuṇṇo pariyosito suhito yāvadattho;
mn3:3.2_0: siyā ca me piṇḍapāto atirekadhammo chaḍḍanīyadhammo.
mn3:3.5_0: ‘ahaṁ khomhi, bhikkhave, bhuttāvī pavārito paripuṇṇo pariyosito suhito yāvadattho;
mn3:3.6_0: atthi ca me ayaṁ piṇḍapāto atirekadhammo chaḍḍanīyadhammo.
mn3:3.7_0: Sace ākaṅkhatha, bhuñjatha, no ce tumhe bhuñjissatha, idānāhaṁ appaharite vā chaḍḍessāmi, appāṇake vā udake opilāpessāmī’ti.
mn3:3.9_0: ‘bhagavā kho bhuttāvī pavārito paripuṇṇo pariyosito suhito yāvadattho;
mn3:3.10_0: atthi cāyaṁ bhagavato piṇḍapāto atirekadhammo chaḍḍanīyadhammo.
mn3:3.11_0: Sace mayaṁ na bhuñjissāma, idāni bhagavā appaharite vā chaḍḍessati, appāṇake vā udake opilāpessati.
mn3:3.15_0: Yannūnāhaṁ imaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ abhuñjitvā imināva jighacchādubbalyena evaṁ imaṁ rattindivaṁ vītināmeyyan’ti.
mn3:3.16_0: So taṁ piṇḍapātaṁ abhuñjitvā teneva jighacchādubbalyena evaṁ taṁ rattindivaṁ vītināmeyya.
mn3:3.18_0: ‘bhagavā kho bhuttāvī pavārito paripuṇṇo pariyosito suhito yāvadattho;
mn3:3.19_0: atthi cāyaṁ bhagavato piṇḍapāto atirekadhammo chaḍḍanīyadhammo.
mn3:3.20_0: Sace mayaṁ na bhuñjissāma, idāni bhagavā appaharite vā chaḍḍessati, appāṇake vā udake opilāpessati.
mn3:3.21_0: Yannūnāhaṁ imaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjitvā jighacchādubbalyaṁ paṭivinodetvā evaṁ imaṁ rattindivaṁ vītināmeyyan’ti.
mn3:3.22_0: So taṁ piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjitvā jighacchādubbalyaṁ paṭivinodetvā evaṁ taṁ rattindivaṁ vītināmeyya.
mn3:3.23_0: Kiñcāpi so, bhikkhave, bhikkhu taṁ piṇḍapātaṁ bhuñjitvā jighacchādubbalyaṁ paṭivinodetvā evaṁ taṁ rattindivaṁ vītināmeyya, atha kho asuyeva me purimo bhikkhu pujjataro ca pāsaṁsataro ca.
mn3:3.25_0: Tañhi tassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno dīgharattaṁ appicchatāya santuṭṭhiyā sallekhāya subharatāya vīriyārambhāya saṁvattissati.
mn3:3.26_0: Tasmātiha me, bhikkhave, dhammadāyādā bhavatha, mā āmisadāyādā.
mn3:3.28_0: ‘kinti me sāvakā dhammadāyādā bhaveyyuṁ, no āmisadāyādā’”ti.
mn3:4.2_0: Idaṁ vatvāna sugato uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ pāvisi.
mn3:4.3_0: Tatra kho āyasmā sāriputto acirapakkantassa bhagavato bhikkhū āmantesi:
mn3:4.5_0: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṁ.
mn3:5.1_0: “Kittāvatā nu kho, āvuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekaṁ nānusikkhanti, kittāvatā ca pana satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekamanusikkhantī”ti?
mn3:5.2_0: “Dūratopi kho mayaṁ, āvuso, āgacchāma āyasmato sāriputtassa santike etassa bhāsitassa atthamaññātuṁ.
mn3:5.3_0: Sādhu vatāyasmantaṁyeva sāriputtaṁ paṭibhātu etassa bhāsitassa attho;
mn3:5.5_0: “Tena hāvuso, suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn3:5.6_0: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato sāriputtassa paccassosuṁ.
mn3:6.1_0: “Kittāvatā nu kho, āvuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekaṁ nānusikkhanti?
mn3:6.2_0: Idhāvuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekaṁ nānusikkhanti,
mn3:6.3_0: yesañca dhammānaṁ satthā pahānamāha, te ca dhamme nappajahanti,
mn3:6.4_0: bāhulikā ca honti, sāthalikā, okkamane pubbaṅgamā, paviveke nikkhittadhurā.
mn3:6.5_0: Tatrāvuso, therā bhikkhū tīhi ṭhānehi gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:6.7_0: iminā paṭhamena ṭhānena therā bhikkhū gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:6.8_0: ‘Yesañca dhammānaṁ satthā pahānamāha te ca dhamme nappajahantī’ti—
mn3:6.9_0: iminā dutiyena ṭhānena therā bhikkhū gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:6.10_0: ‘Bāhulikā ca, sāthalikā, okkamane pubbaṅgamā, paviveke nikkhittadhurā’ti—
mn3:6.11_0: iminā tatiyena ṭhānena therā bhikkhū gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:6.12_0: Therā, āvuso, bhikkhū imehi tīhi ṭhānehi gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:6.14_0: navā bhikkhū tīhi ṭhānehi gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:6.16_0: iminā paṭhamena ṭhānena navā bhikkhū gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:6.17_0: ‘Yesañca dhammānaṁ satthā pahānamāha te ca dhamme nappajahantī’ti—
mn3:6.18_0: iminā dutiyena ṭhānena navā bhikkhū gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:6.19_0: ‘Bāhulikā ca honti, sāthalikā, okkamane pubbaṅgamā, paviveke nikkhittadhurā’ti—
mn3:6.20_0: iminā tatiyena ṭhānena navā bhikkhū gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:6.21_0: Navā, āvuso, bhikkhū imehi tīhi ṭhānehi gārayhā bhavanti.
mn3:6.22_0: Ettāvatā kho, āvuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekaṁ nānusikkhanti.
mn3:7.1_0: Kittāvatā ca panāvuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekamanusikkhanti?
mn3:7.2_0: Idhāvuso, satthu pavivittassa viharato sāvakā vivekamanusikkhanti—

mn3:7.5_0: Tatrāvuso, therā bhikkhū tīhi ṭhānehi pāsaṁsā bhavanti.

mn3:7.11_0: iminā tatiyena ṭhānena therā bhikkhū pāsaṁsā bhavanti.

mn3:7.17_0: ‘Yesañca dhammānaṁ satthā pahānamāha te ca dhamme pajahantī’ti—
mn3:7.18_0: iminā dutiyena ṭhānena navā bhikkhū pāsaṁsā bhavanti.
mn3:7.19_0: ‘Na ca bāhulikā, na sāthalikā okkamane nikkhittadhurā paviveke pubbaṅgamā’ti—

mn3:8.1_0: Tatrāvuso, lobho ca pāpako doso ca pāpako.
mn3:8.2_0: Lobhassa ca pahānāya dosassa ca pahānāya atthi majjhimā paṭipadā cakkhukaraṇī ñāṇakaraṇī upasamāya abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṁvattati.
